response_fields.name: time
response_fields.description: Sample time line time Array (in min)

response_fields.name: audience
response_fields.description: The number of end users during live streaming

response_fields.name: pn
response_fields.description: Value of output video card and sound card by system

response_fields.name: dt
response_fields.description: Number of dropped video frames by system

response_fields.name: dr
response_fields.description: Number of product cards display by number of products

response_fields.name: views
response_fields.description: Number of views during the timeline

response_fields.name: new_cnt
response_fields.description: Number of new added follow members

response_fields.name: comments
response_fields.description: Number of comments sent during live streaming

response_fields.name: shares
response_fields.description: Number of times shared during the stream

response_fields.name: avg_watching_duration
response_fields.description: Average of linear duration watching a live stream

error_codes.description: The information you submit is not found

notes: The documentation shows a complete API endpoint for getting federation session statistics with various metrics related to streaming performance, user engagement, and viewer behavior. All parameters and response fields are clearly defined.
